MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G43 and G44 postcode area of Glasgow. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.09pm. Our emergency response team is currently onsite near the Whittlemuir substation carrying out investigations and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will update this message to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:30pm on Tuesday, 02 March 2021
